sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Slider } from "@/components/ui/slider"; import { Input } from "@/components/ui/input"; export default function PrizeStakingCalculator() { // ─── State (your defaults) ───────────────────────────────────────── const [totalStaked, setTotalStaked] = useState(700_000_000); const [userStake, setUserStake] = useState(10000); const [industryPercent, setIndustryPercent] = useState(10); const [tokenPrice, setTokenPrice] = useState(0.01); // ─── Constants ───────────────────────────────────────────────────── const INDUSTRY_TOTAL = 400_000_000_000; // $400 B const BUSINESS_CUT = 0.03; // $0.03 per $1 const MAX_REVENUE = INDUSTRY_TOTAL * BUSINESS_CUT; // $12 B const COMPOUNDS_PER_YEAR = 365; // daily compounding // ─── 1) User’s share of the staking pool ─────────────────────────── const shareFraction = userStake / totalStaked; const sharePercent = shareFraction * 100; // 0.00142857% by default // ─── 2) User’s annual USD earnings ──────────────────────────────── // yield pool = industryPercent% of $12 B = $1.2 B default const yieldPool = (industryPercent / 100) * MAX_REVENUE; const annualEarnings = shareFraction * yieldPool; // ≈ $17 142.86 // ─── 3) APR (no compounding) ───────────────────────────────────── const initialUSD = userStake * tokenPrice; const aprPercent = (annualEarnings / initialUSD) * 100; // ≈ 17 142.86% // ─── 4) APY (daily compounding) ────────────────────────────────── // APY = (1 + (APR%/100)/365)^365 - 1 const dailyRate = (aprPercent / 100) / COMPOUNDS_PER_YEAR; const apyFraction = Math.pow(1 + dailyRate, COMPOUNDS_PER_YEAR) - 1; const apyPercent = apyFraction * 100; // ≈ 406.86% const apyEarnings = initialUSD * apyFraction; // ≈ $406.86 // ─── 5) Token price for a 20% APY goal ────────────────────────── // 0.2 × (700 M × x) = $1.2 B ⇒ x = 1.2 B / (0.2 × 700 M) ≈ $8.57 const xPriceFor20 = yieldPool === 0 ? 0 : 1_200_000_000 / (0.2 * totalStaked); // ─── Formatter ─────────────────────────────────────────────────── const fmt = n => n.toLocaleString(undefined, { maximumFractionDigits: 2 }); return (

$PRIZE Staking Calculator

{/* ── INPUTS ──────────────────────────────────────────── */}
{/* Total Staked */}
setTotalStaked(Number(e.target.value.replace(/,/g,'')))} className="text-black" style={{ fontSize:'1.3rem', padding:'10px', borderRadius:'8px', width:'100%' }} />

Enter the total number of $PRIZE tokens currently staked on the platform.

{/* User Stake */}
setUserStake(Number(e.target.value.replace(/,/g,'')))} className="text-black" style={{ fontSize:'1.3rem', padding:'10px', borderRadius:'8px', width:'100%' }} />

Enter how many $PRIZE tokens you are considering to stake.

{/* Token Price */}
setTokenPrice(parseFloat(e.target.value)||0)} className="text-black" style={{ fontSize:'1.3rem', padding:'10px', borderRadius:'8px', width:'100%' }} />

Enter the current market price of one $PRIZE token in USD.

{/* Industry slider */}
setIndustryPercent(v[0])} className="slider-field" />
{industryPercent}%

Adjust to estimate what portion of the $400 B annual revenue the platform captures.

{/* ── RESULTS ──────────────────────────────────────────── */}
RESULTS
{/* 1) Share of Pool */}
Your Share of Pool:
{fmt(sharePercent)}%

Percentage of total staked tokens you control.

{/* 2) Annual Earnings */}
Annual Earnings (USD):
${fmt(annualEarnings)}

Your USD yield per year from the $1.2 B pool.

{/* 3) APR */}
APR (%):
{fmt(aprPercent)}%

Annual % return (no compounding).

{/* 4) APY */}
APY (%):
{fmt(apyPercent)}%

Annual % yield, compounded daily.

{/* 5) Price for 20% APY */}
Token Price for 20% APY:
${fmt(xPriceFor20)}

Price per token needed to achieve 20% APY from the same $1.2 B pool.

); }
